metadata.title: CVE-2020-15471 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In nDPI through 3.2, the packet parsing code is vulnerable to a heap-basedbuffer over-read in ndpi_parse_packet_line_info in lib/ndpi_main.c.

criterions.comment: ndpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
